Welcome: Hi {customer_name}, thanks for add me!, you may type !help for instructions :)
Thanks: Thanks for using our Level UP service!, may you leave a +Rep on my profile? <3 <3
Check: I currently have {have_sets} set(s) which you haven't crafted!!{breakline}To buy all of them it'll cost {tf_price} TF2 Key(s)
SellCheck: You currently have {amount} sets which i can buy =D, i can pay up to {tfkeys_amount} tf keys for {tfsets_amount} sets
Level: You'll need {needed} sets to reach level {desired_level}, and it'll cost {price_tf} tf2 keys
Sell_keys: May you wanna buy some keys? Type !sellcheck !
Donthave: Unfortunately i don't have any set which you haven't crafted yet :c
ThemDonthave: Unfortunately you don't have any sets which i can request :c, please come back later ..?
i_need: Unfortunately i only have {currency_qty} {currency} available for you, and i need {needed} for this request :c
them_need: Unfortunately you only have {currency_qty} {currency} available to trade, and you need {needed} for this request :c
Sorryme: Sorry, but i only have {currency_qty} tf keys on my inventory, may you try {command} {command_qty} ?
Sorryme2: Sorry, but i don't have any tf keys on my inventory :/
Sorrythem: Sorry, but you only have {currency_qty} tf keys on your inventory, may you try {command} {command_qty} ?
Sorrythem2: Sorry, but you don't have any tf keys on your inventory :/
Inventory_error: There was an error in load your inventory, please try again :)
Inventory_priv: Your profile is private :({breakline}Please make it public for me ? <3 <3
Loading: Hey bro, i'm currently loading my inventory xD
Badge_error: An error occurred while loading your badges. ;-; Please try again ? <3
General_error: Something wrong has happened :c, please try again ?
SpamWarn3: You're sending to much messages to me, i'll unfriend you, bye :(
Trade_error: An error occurred while sending your trade, can you please try again? thanks <3 <3
Trade_error1: You're unavailable to trade, please try again later :)
Trade_error2: I have sent too many trade offers, or have too many outstanding trade offers with you. {breakline}Can you please cancel some before next request? ty <3
Trade_hold: Sorry bro, but i'm not allowed to accept trade hold :c
Unknow: Unknow command!, Type !help for more information.
UnknowAdmin: Unknow command!, Type !help or !admin for more information.
